title: JSON Schema for X# Config files
description: This is the JSON schema for X# config files. By default X# only runs all XS files in the root folder non-recursively.

excludeFiles.description: The xs files in the directory that should be excluded from compiling.

includeDirectories.description: Directories that have to be included when compiling with X#

items.description: The directory that has to be included when compiling.
